Uses of Package
videopoker

  • Packages that use videopoker 
    Package Description
    gameUI
    package to specify the game modes
    gui  
    videopoker
    package to define how to play any kind of video poker.
    videopoker107DB
    package for the implementation of the type of video poker 10/7 Double Bonus
    videopokerdebug
    package to implement a debug mode of playing Video Poker
  • Classes in videopoker used by gameUI 
    Class and Description
    VideoPoker
    class that makes possible to play the various commands allowed by the game: bet, deal, hold, advise, credit, statistics.
  • Classes in videopoker used by gui 
    Class and Description
    VideoPoker
    class that makes possible to play the various commands allowed by the game: bet, deal, hold, advise, credit, statistics.
  • Classes in videopoker used by videopoker 
    Class and Description
    Credit
    Class that contains int objects to store the credit in different states
    Hand 
    InsufficientFundsException
    Exception to be thrown when there are less funds then the bet
    InvalidAmountException
    Exception to be thrown when one tries to bet more then he/she should
    InvalidCardIndexException
    Exception to be thrown when one tries to hold an invalid position
    InvalidGameStateException
    Exception to be thrown when the command can't be executed in a certain state
    PlayResult
    auxiliary class to store the information needed to present to the user after an hold
    Pot
    class that stores the value that was bet
    Statistics
    abstract class that always the user to define its own statistics
    VideoPokerType
    interface that allows the user to implement the methods to define the video poker type.
  • Classes in videopoker used by videopoker107DB 
    Class and Description
    Hand 
    Statistics
    abstract class that always the user to define its own statistics
    VideoPokerType
    interface that allows the user to implement the methods to define the video poker type.
  • Classes in videopoker used by videopokerdebug 
    Class and Description
    InsufficientFundsException
    Exception to be thrown when there are less funds then the bet
    InvalidAmountException
    Exception to be thrown when one tries to bet more then he/she should
    InvalidGameStateException
    Exception to be thrown when the command can't be executed in a certain state
    VideoPoker
    class that makes possible to play the various commands allowed by the game: bet, deal, hold, advise, credit, statistics.
    VideoPokerType
    interface that allows the user to implement the methods to define the video poker type.
